name: Sam's RPG
description:
This is just a small furry game i made to learn how to make functioning hit boxes and animations. (And it's my first game I've ever uploaded here)
You play as a character called Sam and you can interact with various things.

Heavily inspired by Dazed and Changed by DragonSnow

CONTROLS
Move: W A S D, Arrow keys

Interact/continue dialogue: Z, E, Space

Run: X
